name: DALLAS COUNTY HOSPITAL DISTRICT D/B/A PARKLAND HEALTH
sampleDescriptions: Monitor Medicaid and Medicare proposed changes that could impact funding, operations and delivery of care for the largest public hospital in North Texas.
